mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AT_CHAT_MESSAGE CM LEFT JOIN CUSTOMER_INFO C ON CM.CUSTOMER_ID = C.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT JOIN at_agent_level AAL ON CM.AGENT_LEVEL_ID = AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_ID
AND LOWER(C.NAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'
AND LOWER(AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_NAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'
AND LOWER(CM.AGENT_NAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(CM.SEND_TIME::TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') >= TO_CHAR(#{fromDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}::TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
AND TO_CHAR(CM.SEND_TIME::TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') <= TO_CHAR(#{toDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}::TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
AND CM.DA_PRODUCT_TYPE_ID = #{categoryId}
AND CM.BRAND_ID = #{brandId}

SELECT CM.CHAT_MESSAGE_ID, CM.DA_PRODUCT_TYPE_ID, CM.BRAND_ID, CM.CUSTOMER_LOCATION, CM.MESSAGE_CONTENT, CM.PRICE, CM.PHONE_NO, CM.URL_LINK, CM.SEND_TIME, CM.OP_SEND_FLAG, C.NAME, CM.AGENT_NAME AS LOGIN_NAME, AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_NAME FROM at_chat_message CM LEFT JOIN customer_info C ON CM.CUSTOMER_ID = C.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT JOIN at_agent_level AAL ON CM.AGENT_LEVEL_ID = AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_ID
AND LOWER(C.NAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'
AND LOWER(AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_NAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'
AND LOWER(CM.AGENT_NAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(CM.SEND_TIME::TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') >= TO_CHAR(#{fromDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}::TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
AND TO_CHAR(CM.SEND_TIME::TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') <= TO_CHAR(#{toDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}::TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
GROUP BY CM.SEND_TIME,CM.CHAT_MESSAGE_ID,C.NAME,AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_NAME,CM.AGENT_NAME
ORDER BY C.NAME ASC
ORDER BY C.NAME DESC
ORDER BY AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_NAME ASC
ORDER BY AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_NAME DESC
ORDER BY CM.AGENT_NAME ASC
ORDER BY CM.AGENT_NAME DESC
ORDER BY CM.SEND_TIME ASC
ORDER BY CM.SEND_TIME DESC
ORDER BY CM.PRICE ASC
ORDER BY CM.PRICE DESC
ORDER BY CM.PHONE_NO ASC
ORDER BY CM.PHONE_NO DESC
ORDER BY CM.SEND_TIME DESC
OFFSET #{offset} LIMIT #{limit}
